name: Geometric Resin Sterling Silver Ring
description:
Hand fabricated sterling silver ring filled with hand geometric pigmented resin.

AT CHECKOUT, please let me know the following:

1) Ring Size: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7

2) Shape : Circle, Triangle, Square, Hexagon

3) Color : Blue, Yellow, Purple, Light Pink


* Please understand that the colors of the item may vary little slightly due to different computer monitor settings. *

Your order will be shipped in approximately 1-3 days (working days) after your purchase, if you need an order in rush, please email me and I will do my very best to get it ready quickly.

Thanks for visiting PASTELLER! Have fun!


Feel free to contact me if you have any questions ^___^
